WorkItem.Description:
Uploading patch for review.
 
1. Including DOCTYPE declaration to enable validation and avoid quirks mode. I suggest using strict HTML 4.01
 
2. <style>...</style> section belongs within <head>...</head>. Suggesting that generateHTMLHeader() takes boolean parameter indicating whether styles should be included or not. Defaulting parameter to false enables backward compatibility.
 
3. adding required type attribute type="text/css" withing opening <style> tag
 
4. removing <-- and --> for hiding styles for old browsers (Navigator 2 ?). Not needed nowadays.
 
5. Sans serif -> sans-serif
 
6. Surronding font-family property value with single quotes. Needed in case of e.g. font-family: 'Times New Roman';
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Writer_HTML validation errors against strict HTML 4.01 / CSS 2.1
